properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
50 FOOT S/V SHIPYARD BREWING, WHITE HULL
WITH BLUE TRIM, ONE PERSON ON BOARD,
DISMASTED AND ADRIFT IN 39-16.00S 043-00.00W
AT 120400Z FEB. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO USCG ATLANTIC,
PHONE: 757 398 6700,
EMAIL: LANTWATCH@USCG.MIL.
